name: donsoze
text: Does the soul make it taste better?

name: deimosrising
text: It gives you the power of the Lobster.

name: tombsgrave
text: Including but not limited to: Harder Shell, Clenching Skill, Aquatic Adaptation, Flying Hatchets, Ancient Pendulums, etc.

name: nigelchaos
text: And a  1 to saving throws!

name: quantumcasaba
text:
And Knowledge(aquatic)
Crabs possess vast wisdom pertaining to the deep.
(They know that they can eat plankton and scuttle.)

name: bixschmix
text: Also, it tastes like butter.

name: jollysaintpete
text: before i chubbied this comment, there were five green comments and then this and then five more green comments. now I have made a solid line of eleven green comments, and subsequently ruined it. the joy of the mundane

name: zapatos
text: Don't worry, my Chubbies are set to thirty-three.

name: jaldor
text: I'm pretty sure crabs would have Improved Grab. That way they can start grapples as a free action without provoking an attack of opportunity if they hit with their claw attack.

name: soticoto
text: If it can get me to Cinnabar Island, that is all that matters.

name: farqussus
text: which makes you stick to magnet

name: shutup_shutup
text: Chubbied, but that's lobster.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Wait, deimosrising said lobster.  He was the confused one.

name: afrothunder
text: Eating the soul of a Crab gives you the power of a Lobster?

name: raging_cow
text: You of all avatars should know already

name: theloneliestmonkey
text: I do wish Lyle appeared more often.

name: greyfield
text: Maybe, but I'd rather not see his mouth again. It's strangely large. Just like Philippe's crazy opening mouth.

name: fishingblues
text: It's actually one of the cruelest things Lyle has ever done if you think about it.

name: huber
text: A comment left by huber was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, Dovey, Tinhand, twntysevn27, madnes, twohundredninety, sex_bicycle, foolio, chochacho, StagnantDisplay, rowboat, thunderbat, mustconcentrate, fattypneumonia, mystkmanat, kenyot, eRiUukFJk, Doc_Rostov, Wolfslice, clintisiceman, stormagnet, joamiq, STUART, Darthemed)

name: dovey
text: A comment left by dovey was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, Ariamaki, jollysaintpete, CanusDivinus, perhapsmaybe)

name: canusdivinus
text: Hey. Even Onstad himself refers to characters by characteristic rather than name. Check all the alt texts saying such as "The fat cat..." and then beg for forgiveness for such a wrongful lame!

name: gormster
text: A comment left by gormster was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Ewzicyn, Deusoma, Ariamaki, crawfomp, CanusDivinus, tarnations)

name: foolio
text:
Yeah you shouldn't forget his name

he needs the support at this age

he is five

name: snowman
text: I thought this was a haiku at first

name: mercuri0us
text:
You should not forget his name
he needs the support
because, the otter is five

name: cagliostro
text:
Isn't that a nega-haiku?

'Don't forget his name
He needs support at that age -
He is five, you know.'

name: mercuri0us
text: Heh, yeah.  Turns out it's five-seven-five, so we're both wrong.

name: layzerblade
text: No, cagliostro is right and you're wrong.

name: mercuri0us
text: Looking back at myself from two months ago, I can't imagine why I was so stupid as to say that.  Maybe I was stoned.  Yeah, I'm sure that's what it was...

name: dissembly
text: I beleive, with haiku, the content is sometimes considered more important than the syllabic(?) formula. Neither of these would really be haiku, because they don't focus on nature or the seasons. Senryu is more appropriate, with it's focus on human (or, i guess, sentient-otter) foibles.

name: bigtom
text: he can be a dick but that is why i love him

name: dropkickpikachu
text: This is definitely in my top ten.

name: lizjones
text: I bought this strip just for the "cracked crab dance" panel.

name: hellofyellin
text:
Otters love cracked crab. They eat it on their bellies while they swim on their backs.

Nearly as cute as this comic.

name: hellofyellin
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Philippe has elbows.

name: greenkoolayd
text:
thats cool on 2 levels:

a] it appeals to my inner caveman because its the (result of that)predator vs. prey deal

b] it also appeals to my inner wuss because otters are effing cute

name: reburn
text: Speaking of, is this the first time I have noticed Philippe wear high heels?!  How did I not know this?

name: poodlelucy
text: i believe them to be special dancing shoes, worn only for the cracked crab dance. "here comes a special dance!"

name: clembot
text: onstad was reading the cider house rules when he wrote this

name: relaxing
text: A comment left by relaxing was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, madnes, fell, Wulvaine, Quartzblade, Teabag_Mel)

name: fell
text: NO.

name: kickstart
text: No, it is an OK thing to say.

name: bookofsand
text: This strip is a weird one; you could replace Lyle with Teodor and nothing would change. You'd need to clean up Lyle's diction in panel one, but still... odd.

name: stuart
text: Teodor wouldn't dick around with Phillipe like this.

name: gompo
text: He would also probably be bustling around the kitchen gathering various spices and side dishes instead of staring drunkenly at the pot and the happy otter.

name: spinynorman
text: But it's the only type of staring Lyle knows!

name: straw
text: I love it when they mess with Phillipe.

name: shoinan
text: Lyle is actually a soft-hearted tiger. He just likes to go on the piss. Who doesn't?

name: excusemesenator
text: Lyle got a mouth for Christmas.

name: stuart
text: I'm A-OK with his eventual losing it, probably by way of pawn shop

name: hellabosque
text: i like the john irving's "cider house rules" reference.  lyle is well-read, for a big ol asshole.

name: greenkoolayd
text: lyle doesnt read those kinds of books, doofie.

name: jesler729
text:
Lyle takes a single look at Phillipe

Thinks "Oh hell no none of that"

name: factorial
text: Ugh, when Lyle opens his mouth it's almost more disgusting than Phillipe's.

name: arbys
text:
I love how Philippe has a "Cracked Crab dance".

Does he also have a pizza dance and a filet mignon dance?

name: phy
text: He is an otter. Crab is an otter's favourite, if left to his own devices.

name: phy
text: see hellofyellin's reply way on up there.

name: serf
text: fukken phill is always startin new trends

name: spinynorman
text:
"kind of if that's OK"

The crab's soul is a bashful one.

name: erinye
text: It and Roast Beef would probably get along well.

name: niraj
text: Hahaha, yeah that's the best part

name: stormagnet
text: YES. Plus, it is totally Mr. Hankey's voice that I hear in my head here.

name: spinynorman
text: <--- Allergic to shellfish. Cept oysters, oddly enough...

name: stormagnet
text: Aw, man. I'm sorry to hear that, that blows. At least you got oysters, though. Unless you don't like oysters, in which case you have proof positive that the universe is fucking with you.

name: snowman
text: Crabs are an insecure bunch.

name: dejavroom
text: hi, sorry for not replying earlier, but assetbar and I are just not talking. yes, "rosemary's baby" ^^ "everything is just fine, ros'mary" BULGE EYES

name: mountaindewtab
text: the soul adds hella flavor now what are they going to do

name: c_dizzle
text: This needs a 5.

name: skoora
text:
I don't really have anything funny to say, just that this is probably my favorite strip.

If I ever eat cracked crab, there will be a fiver-year-old otter dancing in my mind.

name: stormagnet
text:
You mean you haven't?!

I think that counts as Circumstances right there, all by itself.

name: tinhand
text: Every time Philippe is happy about something, the nearest character has to ruin it for him. Let us not forget the 99cent pen, or the micky mouse pancake. Philippe is funnier for the things that happen to him rather than the things he does.

name: charchar
text: My dad used to do shit like this to me all the fracking time. I cried the day I found out pepperoni doesn't grow on happy tress: it is dead, smashed-up cows with spices. I still believe in the Great Gopher Round-Up.

name: _cheesekayke
text: I'm just cracking myself up imagining Lyle's crab falsetto. I can hear it so clearly it's frightening.

name: fattypneumonia
text: Chubbied for the choice phrase "crab falsetto."

name: rheabird13
text: i really tried to do the cracked crab dance, but you see, it is so very hard to sing the cracked crab dance song. philippe is a very talented little 5 year old.

name: genequagmire
text:
That is pure, unadulterated evil. I'm pretty sure I should never have kids.

I love Lyle.
